ruleBookInfo.author: [property$=author]@content
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}} 
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
<js>
result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+\s/,'$1 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)(、|. ?)/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)*/,'$1 $2$3')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
.replace(/第0+/,'第')
</js>

exploreUrl:
今日热榜::/?_id=tophub-today&page={{page}}
哔哩专栏::/?_id=bilibili-zhuanlan
知乎日报::/?_id=zhihu-daily

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var tmp, sid, id;
var text = '';
var alias = {
  'tophub.today': 'tophub-today',
  'daily.zhihu': 'zhihu-daily',
  hjenglish: 'hujiang-en'
};

if (baseUrl.includes('_id')) {
  sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  id = baseUrl.match(/[^_]id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
} else {
  for (var key in alias) {
    if (baseUrl.includes(key)) {
      sid = alias[key];
      break;
    }
  }
}

switch (sid) {
  case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
    tmp = java.ajax('https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv' + id);
    java.setContent(tmp);
    text = java.getString('class.article-holder@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'zhihu-daily': {
    text = java.getString('class.content@html');
    break;
  }
  case 'hujiang-en': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.article-content@html')).replace(
      /（翻译.+）|图片来源.+/g,
      ''
    );
    break;
  }
  case 'tophub-today': {
    text = String(java.getString('class.Zd-p-Sc@html'))
      .replace(
        //g,
        '\n.\n                      - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -\n.\n'
      )
      .replace(/网页端只展示.+/, '');
    break;
  }
}

if (!text) {
  text = '｡◕‿◕｡' + (sid ? '\n' + sid : '');
}

text;

</js>

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var o = [];
if (!baseUrl.includes('debug')) {
  importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);

  var sid = baseUrl.match(/\?_id=([^=&]+)=?/)[1];
  var tmp, data;
  // title, author, tags, new, intro, cover, url
  var page = baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/);
  page = page ? page[1] : '';

  switch (sid) {
    case 'bilibili-zhuanlan': {
      // 哔哩哔哩专栏排行榜
      function toList(str) {
        var arr = JSON.parse(str).data;
        arr.forEach(a => {
          if (o.every(v => v.id !== a.id)) {
            o.push({
              id: a.id,
              title: a.title,
              author: a.author.name,
              tags: a.categories.map(v => v.name),
              intro: a.summary,
              new: a.dynamic,
              cover: a.banner_url,
              url: baseUrl + '&id=' + a.id
            });
          }
        });
      }
      var rankUrl = 'https://api.bilibili.com/x/article/rank/list?cid=';
      // 昨天
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '3');
      toList(tmp);

      // 前天
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '4');
      toList(tmp);

      // 周榜
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '2');
      toList(tmp);

      // 月榜
      tmp = java.ajax(rankUrl + '1');
      toList(tmp);

      break;
    }

    case 'zhihu-daily': {
      o = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax('https://daily.zhihu.com'))
        .select('.main-content-wrap a')
        .toArray()
        .map(a => {
          var url = 'https://daily.zhihu.com' + a.attr('href');
          var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
          var author = J.select('.meta .author')
            .text()
            .replace('，', '');
          return {
            url: url,
            title: a.text(),
            cover: a.select('img').attr('src'),
            author: author,
            tags: [author],
            new: J.select('.meta .bio').text(),
            intro: J.select('.content p:first-child')
              .text()
              .trim()
          };
        })
        .filter(v => !v.title.includes('如何正确地吐槽'));
      break;
    }

    case 'hujiang-en': {
      var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com/fanyi/shuangyu';

      url += page ? '_' + page + '/' : '/';

      var groups = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url))
        .select('.left-content .sp-article-module')
        .toArray()
        .forEach(list => {
          var defaulCover = list.select('img').attr('data-src');
          list
            .select('a')
            .toArray()
            .forEach(a => {
              var title = a.text().replace('有声双语美文：', '');

              if (/1、优惠秒杀|英语课程/.test(title)) return;

              var url = 'https://www.hjenglish.com' + a.attr('href');
              var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url)).select('.module-article');
              var cover = J.select('#J-article-content img:first-child').attr(
                'src'
              );
              cover = String(cover).trim();
              var content = J.select(
                '#J-article-content div[class*=langs]'
              ).html();
              var author = J.select('.info span:first-child').text();
              var trans = J.select('#J-article-content')
                .html()
                .match(/（(翻译：.+)）/);
              var tags = [author];
              if (trans) {
                tags.push(trans[1]);
              }
              o.push({
                cover: cover || defaulCover,
                title: title,
                url: url,
                author: author.replace('作者：', ''),
                tags: tags,
                new: J.select('.info span:nth-child(2)').text(),
                intro: content.slice(0, 500) + '...'
              });
            });
        });

      break;
    }

    case 'tophub-today': {
      var p = page ? '?p=' + page : '';
      var baseurl = 'https://tophub.today';

      function toList(url, nav) {
        var list = [];
        var J = Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
        var tcs = J.select('.bc-tc').toArray();
        var ccs = J.select('.bc-cc').toArray();
        tcs.forEach((tc, i) => {
          var cc = ccs[i];
          var cds = cc.select('.cc-cd').toArray();
          cds.forEach(cd => {
            var title = cd.select('.cc-cd-lb').text();
            var tag = cd.select('.cc-cd-sb-st').text();
            var links = cd.select('.nano-content a').toArray();
            var intro = links
              .map((link, i) => i + 1 + '. ' + link.select('.t').text())
              .join('\n---\n');
            list.push({
              cover: cd.select('.cc-cd-lb img').attr('src'),
              title: title + ' - ' + tag,
              url: baseurl + cd.select('.cc-cd-is a').attr('href'),
              tags: [nav],
              new: cd.select('.i-h').text(),
              intro: intro
            });
          });
        });
        return list;
      }

      var navs = {
        综合: 'news',
        科技: 'tech',
        娱乐: 'ent',
        社区: 'community'
      };

      var lists = [];
      for (var name in navs) {
        var list = toList(baseurl + '/c/' + navs[name] + p, name);
        lists.push(list);
      }
      lists[0].forEach((v, i) => {
        lists.forEach((l, j) => {
          o.push(lists[j][i]);
        });
      });
    }
  }
}

o;

</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('url'),
};
book;
</js>

<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('#intro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有items取前10个结果
if(JSON.parse(result).items){
json=JSON.parse(result).items.slice(0,10);}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/search?keyword='+key+'&type=2&page='+page+'&searchType=2&sortMode=DESC'));

//判定json里是否有items取前10个结果
if(json1.items){
json2=json1.items
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);

//返回json字符串
result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]
ruleSearch.name: $.novelname||$.novelName

ruleSearch.author: @JSon:$.authorname
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
key=java.get('key');
page=java.get('page');

//创建两个空数组
json=[];json2=[];

//判定json里是否有items
if(JSON.parse(result).items){
json=JSON.parse(result).items;}

//加载作者搜索页面并转为json
json1=JSON.parse(java.ajax('http://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/search?keyword='+key+'&type=2&page='+page+'&searchType=2&sortMode=DESC'));

//判定json里是否有items
if(json1.items){
json2=json1.items
}

//书名搜索列表与作者搜索列表拼接
list=json.concat(json2);
Json=[];

//判断搜索结果是否含关键词
for(i in list){
if((list[i].novelname.indexOf(key)>-1||list[i].authorname.indexOf(key)>-1) && list[i].novelClass.indexOf('未知-未知-未知-未知')==-1){
Json.push(list[i])
}
}
result=JSON.stringify(Json)
</js>
$.[*]
ruleSearch.name: $.novelname

搜索用户格式
@用户名

搜索合集格式（合集的作者名是blogname）
#合集
搜用户，合集时请关闭精确搜索

为防止大家的<发现地址规则>被清楚，所以书源url加了个1，不会覆盖旧书源（此书源改了搜索规则）
请大家把自己旧书源的<发现地址规则>粘贴到这里以后，自行修改一下🏷标签的url，
将,之前的网址改成
https://api.lofter.com/oldapi/tagPosts.api?product=lofter-android-6.11.1

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];
if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
[property$=chapter_name]@content
##\d+\.|（.*|\(.*|【.*|(零|一|二|三|四|五|六|七|八|九|十|百|千|万)(.|\s)*章|“|”
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

result?result:'无法获取内容？
1.编辑书源添加自己的账号信息，找到目录列表规则，按提示添加账号信息
2.如果添加了账号信息仍然无法获取内容，请尝试刷新或更新账号信息（方式二）
3.必要说明：如果使用方式一添加了账号信息，每次打开新的书籍详情页或刷新正文都会重新获取账号信息，因此之前获取的书籍正文的链接将会失效，因此建议全文下载或者按2操作
必要说明：在使用本源前，请考虑到使用本源可能造成的账号封禁等问题'

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()).replace(/.*：/,'');
var book = {
	name: o('h2'),
	author: o('.block_txt2 p:eq(3)'),
	kind: o('.block_txt2 p:eq(4)') + ',' + o('.block_txt2 p:eq(5)').replace(/中|已/,''),
	latest: o('.block_txt2 p:eq(7)').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, ''),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + o('.block_txt2 p:eq(6)').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.intro_info').replace(/\d+/, '').replace(/\s+/,'\n'),
	cover: J.select('.block_img2 img').attr('src'),
	url: 'http://www.shencou.com/read/' + parseInt(baseUrl.match(/id=(\d+)/)[1]/1000) + '/' + baseUrl.match(/id=(\d+)/)[1] + '/index.html',
};
book;
</js>

let words=['都市言情','古代言情','玄幻言情','校园言情','穿越言情','灵异言情','短篇','二次元','灵异','都市','玄幻奇幻','历史军事','武侠仙侠','游戏竞技','科幻末世','明星同人','动漫同人','游戏同人','影视同人','小说同人'];

words.map(o=>{

})

}
java.getString("$.wordcount")
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="https://afdian.net/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
</js>

ruleContent.content: if(baseUrl.match(/album-info/)){ text="↓复制下面网址，在书架选择◎添加网址◎，粘贴网址，即可阅读本书↓\n"+baseUrl+"\n简介："+JSON.parse(result).data.album.content }else if(baseUrl.match(/post_id/)){ json=JSON.parse(result) pics=json.data.post.pics; video=json.data.post.video?"视频链接："+json.data.post.video:"" preview_text=json.data.post.preview_text?json.data.post.preview_text:"" imgs=""; for(i in pics){ imgs+='\n' } result=json.data.post.content+imgs+video; result!=""?result:preview_text+"\n💰"+json.data.post.min_price+"\n"+json.data.post.has_right_errMsg }else{ result="↓↓复制下面文字，编辑书源，添加至发现规则↓↓\n"+book.name+"的作品集::"+baseUrl.replace(/page=1/,'page={\{page}}') }

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/50);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}
for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*50)))
}
list
</js>

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
jms=JSON.parse(result);
jm=String(jms.body.content).split("a2o@");
function formatSeconds(value) { 
var theTime = parseInt(value);// 秒 
var theTime1 = 0;// 分 
var theTime2 = 0;// 小时 
if(theTime > 60) { 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime/60); 
theTime = parseInt(theTime%60); 
if(theTime1 > 60) { 
theTime2 = parseInt(theTime1/60); 
theTime1 = parseInt(theTime1%60); } } 
var result = ""+parseInt(theTime)+"秒"; 
if(theTime1 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime1)+"分"+result; } 
if(theTime2 > 0) { 
result = ""+parseInt(theTime2)+"小时"+result; } 
return result; } 
if(jm.length>1){
key="S3VqaWFuZ0FwcDc0NzYwNQ==";
iv=jm[0];
data=jm[1];
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.java.io,
    Packages.java.util,
    Packages.java.util.zip
);
with(javaImport) {
    function decode(content) {
        decode = Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(content));
             byteArrayOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
             byteArrayInputStream = new ByteArrayInputStream(decode);
            gZIPInputStream = new GZIPInputStream(byteArrayInputStream);
            bArr = String(" ").getBytes(); 
            while (true) {
                read = gZIPInputStream.read(bArr);
                if (read > 0) {
                    byteArrayOutputStream.write(bArr, 0, read);
                } else {
                    gZIPInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayInputStream.close();
                    byteArrayOutputStream.close();
                    return byteArrayOutputStream.toString();
                }
          }
    }
}

decode(java.aesBase64DecodeToString(data,java.base64Decode(key),"AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding",java.base64Decode(iv)))}
else{"新章节需要解封\n"+"解锁时间还需："+formatSeconds(String(jms.body.left_seconds))}
</js>

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")
